title: NextTech Lab
description: Contributing to the Machine Learning division at NextTech Lab, leveraging my expertise to explore the intersection of quantum computing and machine learning.
Currently working on a project that involves the development of a Quantum Machine Learning model using Qiskit and IBM Quantum Experience.

title: Data Science Community
description: Leading the Data Science division at NextTech Lab, where I am responsible for organizing workshops, webinars, and hackathons to promote the culture of Data Science and Machine Learning among students.
Conducting workshops on various topics such as Data Analysis, Machine Learning, and Deep Learning.

title: Google Developer Student Clubs
description: Leading the Machine Learning division at Google Developer Student Clubs, where I am responsible for organizing workshops, webinars, and hackathons to promote the culture of Machine Learning among students.
Conducting workshops on various topics such as Data Analysis, Machine Learning, and Deep Learning.
